hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Right.item: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
